    • 字段详细资料

      • APPLICATION_X_WWW_FORM_URLENCODED

        @Deprecated
public static final String APPLICATION_X_WWW_FORM_URLENCODED
        已过时。 use Headers.HEAD_VALUE_ACCEPT_APPLICATION_X_WWW_FORM_URLENCODED instead.
        The value is "application/x-www-form-urlencoded".
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • MULTIPART_FORM_DATA

        @Deprecated
public static final String MULTIPART_FORM_DATA
        已过时。 use Headers.HEAD_VALUE_ACCEPT_MULTIPART_FORM_DATA instead.
        The value is "multipart/form-data".
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM

        @Deprecated
public static final String APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM
        已过时。 use Headers.HEAD_VALUE_ACCEPT_APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM instead.
        The value is "application/octet-stream".
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

        @Deprecated

        已过时。 use Headers.HEAD_VALUE_ACCEPT_APPLICATION_JSON instead.
        The value is "application/json".

        @Deprecated
public static final int TIMEOUT_8S
        已过时。 use getDefaultConnectTimeout() or getDefaultReadTimeout() instead.
        The value is 8000.

        常量字段值

    • 方法详细资料

      • newRequestQueue

        public static RequestQueue newRequestQueue()
        Create a new request queue, using NoHttp default configuration. And number of concurrent requests is .
        返回:
        Returns the request queue, the queue is used to control the entry of the request.
        另请参阅:
        newRequestQueue(int), newRequestQueue(Cache, int), newRequestQueue(ImplRestConnection, int), newRequestQueue(ImplRestParser, int)

      • newRequestQueue

        public static RequestQueue newRequestQueue(int threadPoolSize)
        Create a new request queue, using NoHttp default configuration.
        参数:
        threadPoolSize - request the number of concurrent.
        返回:
        Returns the request queue, the queue is used to control the entry of the request.
        另请参阅:
        newRequestQueue(), newRequestQueue(Cache, int), newRequestQueue(ImplRestConnection, int), newRequestQueue(ImplRestParser, int)

      • newRequestQueue

        public static RequestQueue newRequestQueue(Cache<CacheEntity> cache,
                                           int threadPoolSize)
        Create a new request queue, using NoHttp default request connection HttpRestConnection and default response parser HttpRestParser.
        参数:
        cache - cache interface, which is used to cache the request results.
        threadPoolSize - request the number of concurrent.
        返回:
        Returns the request queue, the queue is used to control the entry of the request.
        另请参阅:
        newRequestQueue(), newRequestQueue(int), newRequestQueue(ImplRestConnection, int), newRequestQueue(ImplRestParser, int)

      • newRequestQueue

        public static RequestQueue newRequestQueue(ImplRestConnection implRestConnection,
                                           int threadPoolSize)
        Create a new request queue, using NoHttp default request executor HttpRestConnection and default response parser HttpRestParser.
        参数:
        implRestConnection - network operating interface, The implementation of the network layer.
        threadPoolSize - request the number of concurrent.
        返回:
        Returns the request queue, the queue is used to control the entry of the request.
        另请参阅:
        newRequestQueue(), newRequestQueue(int), newRequestQueue(Cache, int), newRequestQueue(ImplRestParser, int)

      • newRequestQueue

        public static RequestQueue newRequestQueue(ImplRestParser implRestParser,
                                           int threadPoolSize)
        Create a new request queue.
        参数:
        implRestParser - the response parser, The result of parsing the network layer.
        threadPoolSize - request the number of concurrent.
        返回:
        Returns the request queue, the queue is used to control the entry of the request.
        另请参阅:
        newRequestQueue(), newRequestQueue(int), newRequestQueue(Cache, int), newRequestQueue(ImplRestConnection, int)

      • createStringRequest

        public static Request<String> createStringRequest(String url)
        Create a String type request, the request method is RequestMethod.GET.
        参数:
        url - such as: http://www.google.com.
        返回:
        Request<String>.
        另请参阅:
        createStringRequest(String, RequestMethod)

        public static DownloadQueue newDownloadQueue(int threadPoolSize)
        Create a new download queue.
        参数:
        threadPoolSize - thread pool number, here is the number of concurrent tasks.
        返回:
        DownloadQueue.
        另请参阅:
        newDownloadQueue(), newDownloadQueue(Downloader, int)

        threadPoolSize - number of concurrent.

      • createDownloadRequest

        public static DownloadRequest createDownloadRequest(String url,
                                                    String fileFolder,
                                                    boolean isDeleteOld)
        Create a download object, auto named file. The request method is RequestMethod.GET.
        参数:
        url - download address.
        fileFolder - folder to save file.
        isDeleteOld - find the same when the file is deleted after download, or on behalf of the download is complete, not to request the network.
        返回:
        DownloadRequest.
        另请参阅:
        createDownloadRequest(String, RequestMethod, String, String, boolean, boolean)

      • createDownloadRequest

        public static DownloadRequest createDownloadRequest(String url,
                                                    RequestMethod requestMethod,
                                                    String fileFolder,
                                                    boolean isDeleteOld)
        Create a download object, auto named file.
        参数:
        url - download address.
        requestMethod - RequestMethod.
        fileFolder - folder to save file.
        isDeleteOld - find the same when the file is deleted after download, or on behalf of the download is complete, not to request the network.
        返回:
        DownloadRequest.
        另请参阅:
        createDownloadRequest(String, RequestMethod, String, String, boolean, boolean)

      • createDownloadRequest

        public static DownloadRequest createDownloadRequest(String url,
                                                    String fileFolder,
                                                    String filename,
                                                    boolean isRange,
                                                    boolean isDeleteOld)
        Create a download object. The request method is RequestMethod.GET.
        参数:
        url - download address.
        fileFolder - folder to save file.
        filename - filename.
        isRange - whether the breakpoint continuing.
        isDeleteOld - find the same when the file is deleted after download, or on behalf of the download is complete, not to request the network.
        返回:
        DownloadRequest.
        另请参阅:
        createDownloadRequest(String, RequestMethod, String, String, boolean, boolean)

      • createDownloadRequest

        public static DownloadRequest createDownloadRequest(String url,
                                                    RequestMethod requestMethod,
                                                    String fileFolder,
                                                    String filename,
                                                    boolean isRange,
                                                    boolean isDeleteOld)
        Create a download object.
        参数:
        url - download address.
        requestMethod - RequestMethod.
        fileFolder - folder to save file.
        filename - filename.
        isRange - whether the breakpoint continuing.
        isDeleteOld - find the same when the file is deleted after download, or on behalf of the download is complete, not to request the network.
        返回:
        DownloadRequest.
        另请参阅:
        createDownloadRequest(String, String, String, boolean, boolean)

        @Deprecated
